metadata.Title: CVE-2012-6531 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: (1) Zend_Dom, (2) Zend_Feed, and (3) Zend_Soap in Zend Framework 1.x before1.11.13 and 1.12.x before 1.12.0 do not properly handle SimpleXMLElementclasses, which allow remote attackers to read arbitrary files or create TCPconnections via an external entity reference in a DOCTYPE element in anXML-RPC request, aka an XML external entity (XXE) injection attack, adifferent vulnerability than CVE-2012-3363.

criterions.comment: zend-framework: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
